helm install prometheus  -f values.yaml prometheus-community/kube-prometheus-stack

helm install nfs-storage nfs-subdir-external-provisioner/nfs-subdir-external-provisioner     --set nfs.server=172.31.51.90     --set nfs.path=/ifs/dost-isi-cl1/NFS/Kubernetes --set storageClass.name=emas-storage
